extendedInfo.description: Klink is a utility by Faveset LLC for connecting a PC or Mac to your Android device over USB.  It focuses on simplicity and gets the job done with a few taps.  Yet, it is one of the fastest of its kind.  Power users also won't feel left out, as it has many mobile-specific settings that don't exist anywhere else.Installation is simple like with EasyTether or PdaNet, and the in-app setup guide walks you through everything in less than 10 minutes.The original version has over 20,000 paid users and an average Market rating above 4.3, so everything is well-tested, but please don't hesitate to email and ask questions!NOTE: Please try the free demo version ("Klink - Tether Demo" on the market) to test compatibility before buying.  Klink should work with every device out there, so don't hesitate to contact support if you need help.  The demo can be upgraded via the market without any further configuration on your computer.FEATURES:- Supports Windows (XP/Vista/7/8/32-bit/64-bit), Mac OS X 10.5 (or later), and Ubuntu Linux (32-bit/64-bit).  * Ubuntu binaries can be used with other Linux distributions (also tested with Fedora and Arch).- This is only for USB connections to a PC or Mac.  Tablets are not supported!- Does not require a rooted device- It has a unique Mimic Mobile Device mode that lets you browse mobile pages as the device of your choosing to conserve data.  Moreover, this mode can also block common background data activity to avoid excessive data usage.- Written in C (NOT Java) for efficiency, speed, and lower power consumption.  * Is fast and capable of handling 4g speeds: can reach 30mbps in real-world conditions on capable devices.NOTE TO PURCHASERS OF THE ORIGINAL KLINK: Your purchase is still valid, and it is NOT necessary to buy this version.  Please visit the "Download" page at www.faveset.com to download the original version of Klink, or email support if you have questions.USAGE:After installing and running Klink, please tap "Set up your Computer" and follow the instructions.  Klink requires the installation of a small companion program on your PC or Mac, so following the step-by-step guide is suggested.HELP: Please visit the Google Group via http://www.faveset.com/klink/support, or email klink@faveset.com.It would be appreciated if you asked for help before posting negative feedback, as virtually all problems can be resolved.  Otherwise, please leave your email address when commenting so that someone can get in touch with you.As some users may have difficulty evaluating everything within the 15-minute refund window, a once-per-user 24-hour return policy is in effect; simply include your order number when contacting support.  No one should feel rushed.  Please contact support if you need any help during setup.PERMISSIONS:CHECK_LICENSE - Needed for Android Market license verification.INTERNET - Requires a data connection.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Used for downloading companion files during setup.

reviews.title: Best App!!!
reviews.comment: I was a little worried at first it might not work but it did, and its fast! If you need to tether, there isnt a better app than this one. Its great!! Thanks
reviews.author: Daniella Goodwin

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been up and down the block looking for the driver to hook up my phone to windows xp. I found a complete solution with this package. Money well spent.
reviews.author: Michael Pienaar

reviews.title: Worked on Virgin HTC EVO 4 3G
reviews.comment: Sprint sneakily has the Hot Spot now disabled, worked when I 1st got the phone with WIFI. But tethering / USB = much faster speed since 4G has to no longer be disabled to enable WIFI. (They use same antenna) and price was not bad for what you get either.
reviews.author: Scott Rossmann

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy
reviews.comment: One of the best tethering app.. Bought it long ago .. Still working like a gem . thanks bruvs
reviews.author: Sameer Bhakshi

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: Not working property. Kept loosing the data connection.  Money wasted.
reviews.author: Jessica Bowley

reviews.title: Great for Linux Mint
reviews.comment: Finally found a great way to tether my HTC One to Mint 15 without rooting, the trial can mislead though because none of the example web pages would open, went ahead and bought it and I\'m not limited at all. I\'m a very happy customer
reviews.author: Gordon Bowles

reviews.title: Works with Puppy Linux
reviews.comment: $4.99 well spent. Klink works with Precise Puppy 5.4 and Wary Puppy 5.5. Installed on both with just a click of the .deb package. Still have to go to the command-line to start it on the computer side, but that\'s no biggee. 5 stars from this klink user!
reviews.author: mark cornelius

reviews.title: Great software!
reviews.comment: This is a really great app to use when there are no open wi-fi connections. The only reason I docked a star is because the driver software for my PC constantly freezes, causing me to lose a connection. Other than that though, money well spent!
reviews.author: Brandi Jackinowicz

reviews.title: SPECTACULAR!!! 10 STARS!!!
reviews.comment: I love you, Klink devs! I want to have like 10, 000 of your babies! This is the only app Ive ever paid for, and it was SO worth it! Worth it 1, 000 times over! THIS TETHER APP WORKS. Flawlessly. (And I have Sprint! \'Nuff said!) Its so easy to set up & use, no Wi-Fi needed. Im kicking myself for the many months of hair-pulling frustration I wasted struggling with Pdanet- unreliable & unsecure. Dumb! The answer was here all along! I\'m a believer! Eternal devotion to the Klink team! All hail the Tether Gods!
reviews.author: Selene Butcher

reviews.title: Klink
reviews.comment: Awesome!! Works faster than a hotspot!
reviews.author: Molly Leacox

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: It works GREAT! As directed use the demo version first. It works with my Windows Vista Dell laptop. Simple, cheap & easy to install & use. I highly recommend! (To be clear I am one happy camper who does NOT work for Faveset Klink.)
reviews.author: John Q. Tran

reviews.title: htc one thru net 10
reviews.comment: thanks klink team, you\'re the greatest, hope i dont get busted! Works like a charm! At least you did your part!! Total 5 stars from me!
reviews.author: Tina Anderson

reviews.title: Great App even better Developers!
reviews.comment: Had this app for quite a while. Ran into some issues. Kevin stuck by my side the entire time (2 weeks) and was a great help. He worked day after day to find an answer and was successful. I am forever grateful. Some questions/issues had nothing to do with klink and he was nice enough to find an answer for me anyway. Words cannot express my gratitude I am forever indebted and thankful! Thanks again tremendously!!
reviews.author: Adri B

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Excellent application, and--more importantly--excellent customer support. Not only is Ubuntu supported, but the developer provided instructions in the Google groups for running with Arch Linux (and other distros) as well. Absolutely worth the money if you\'re looking for a tethering application!
reviews.author: Brandon Runnels

reviews.title: Works looks a charm!
reviews.comment: Best 5 dollars ever spent!
reviews.author: Derrick Lewallen

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it, best $4.99 ever spent!!
reviews.author: Casey Amidon

reviews.title: Thanks! Great app
reviews.comment: This app is my lifeline to getting on the web w my computers. Works great. Evo 3d
reviews.author: Jennifer Mara

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Works great on both Windows and Mac!
reviews.author: Paul Criswell

reviews.title: Great customer service
reviews.comment: I emailed them with my problem connecting, and they wrote me right back!
reviews.author: Antonio Jaramillo

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app. Does what it says. Not complicated at all. Just need to follow directions to get pc program then your up and running.
reviews.author: James G
